TopicTitle: The mighty ascent of the monoprop tank

Articles.Content: I switched from a splashed down vessel to a part that bounced off the water and witnessed it's greatness, breaking free from the pull of gravity.

Oh my.

You should power a ship with that tech Seems like the second coming of the K-drive
This looks similar to a bug I've encountered when switching from the Tracking Station to a piece of debris "in flight" - it ends up in interstellar space at superluminal velocity xD
